Title: Requires municipal approval of and a public hearing on the siting of community residential facilities and removes the property tax exemption
Summary: Requires municipal approval of and a public hearing on the siting of community residential facilities for mentally disabled persons and removes the property tax exemption for such community residential facilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง41.34, Ment Hyg L; amd ยง422, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring municipal approval of community residential facility site selection and to require a public hearing on such siting; and to amend the real property tax law, in relation to removing the tax exemption for community residences
